comment:
* An entity class that describes the information required to send transactions * between a device and an online DRM server. The DRM framework achieves * server registration, license acquisition, and any other server-related transactions * by passing an instance of this class to {@link DrmManagerClient#processDrmInfo}. *

* The caller can retrieve the {@link DrmInfo} instance by passing a {@link DrmInfoRequest} * instance to {@link DrmManagerClient#acquireDrmInfo}. * * @deprecated Please use {@link android.media.MediaDrm}

variables.name: mAttributes
variables.comment: DRM scheme such as account id, path or multiple path's

methods.name: public void put(String key, Object value)
methods.comment: * Adds optional information as key-value pairs to this object. To add a custom object * to the DrmInfo object, you must override the {@link #toString} implementation. * * @param key Key to add. * @param value Value to add. *

methods.name: public Object get(String key)
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the value of a given key.
     *
     * @param key The key whose value is being retrieved.
     *
     * @return The value of the key being retrieved. Returns null if the key cannot be found.

methods.name: public Iterator<String> keyIterator()
methods.comment: * Retrieves an iterator object that you can use to iterate over the keys associated with * this DrmInfo object. * * @return The iterator object.

methods.name: public Iterator<Object> iterator()
methods.comment: * Retrieves an iterator object that you can use to iterate over the values associated with * this DrmInfo object. * * @return The iterator object.

methods.name: public byte[] getData()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the trigger data associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The trigger data.

methods.name: public String getMimeType()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the MIME type associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The MIME type.

methods.name: public int getInfoType()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the information type associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The information type.

methods.name: boolean isValid()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether this instance is valid or not
     *
     * @return
     *     true if valid
     *     false if invalid

methodNames: public void put(String key, Object value)
